ambiguities.intent: Convert Bags Checked to an integer.

ambiguities.source_text: Change the Flow Card field to Yes / No values instead of 1 / 0
ambiguities.ref: "Flow Card?": df["Flow Card?"].str.strip().map(lambda v: "Yes" if v == "1" else "No"),

ambiguities.source_text: Convert the following data fields to the correct data types: Price to a decimal value
Split the Flight Details field to form: Date Flight Number From To Class Price
Split the Flight Details field to form: Date Flight Number From To Class Price
